The locations of your home and the villagers\' homes can be changed later.
Get a bed from Nook and install it in the tent to sleep
Donate 5 creatures and decide on the location for Blathers\' tent
Later on, you\'ll donate all types of creatures to the museum, so feel free to donate any creature.
Wait until the next day
Animal Crossing is a slow-life game that reflects real time, date, and seasons.
From now on, sleeping in the bed won\'t skip to the next day. It has to be 5 AM in real time to move to the next day.
Get the shovel and vaulting pole recipes from Blathers\' tent
Eating one piece of fruit allows you to completely remove a rock or tree.
However, since rocks only spawn on the island at a rate of 1 per day, with a maximum of 6, and there are important items that only come from rocks, it\'s better not to break them.
Donate 15 creatures
Gather materials for the shop: 30 wood, 30 softwood, 30 hardwood, 30 iron nuggets
Iron nuggets are precious items found only in rocks, making it hard to collect 30 in one day.
[Tip 1]\nBy digging holes like in the picture and standing between the hole and the rock, you can get up to 8 items by quickly hitting the rocks.
[Tip 2]\nYou can also visit a mystery island using a Nook Miles Ticket, purchasable for 2,000 Nook Miles at the Nook Stop.

[Tip 3]\nHow to visit a mystery island: Go to the airport -> Talk to Orville -> Select "visit other places." -> Use a Nook Miles Ticket\n(Since a NMT can be sold for more than 100K bells online, use them wisely!)

Fill empty house plots with furniture
As soon as you fill an empty house plot with furniture, a villager to move in is randomly determined. However, you can use NMTs to bring in a specific villager you want.

[How to get villager you want]
1. Before filling the house plot with furniture, visit a mystery islands many times until you find a villager you like.
2. Invite the villager to your island.
3. Fill the house plot with furniture.
[Caution]\nVillagers will appear on a mystery island only if there is an unclaimed empty house plot. If the plot is marked \'SOLD\' in red letters, a villager has already been determined.
Besides NMT, the campsite and amiibo are methods to fill your island with desired villagers.
